titleInfo.title: Two views of the Gulf of Aden coast drawn by Capt. Haines

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pencil with additions in pen and ink on paper.Dimensions:283 x 535 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Two outline sketches in pencil with titles added in black ink: ‘Land forming the West.n side of Bunder Fuggum’ and in pencil ‘West of Aden’; and ‘Gibbul Shumsan from the Vessel at Anchor in Aden eastern bay’. Engraved copy at IOR/X/3224/1.Inscriptions:On recto in the bottom right-hand corner in pen and red ink: ‘Original Drawing engraved in the Chart of the several Bays near Cape Aden by Capt. Haines, 1836’.
